4311110.name: Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator Demo
4311110.description:
Experience your first day on the job in Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator, as your journey begins as a park ranger in Faremont National Park.

In this demo, you’re introduced to the everyday responsibilities of a ranger in the park’s forest region. Maintain and reopen trails for visitors, bring a campsite back in order, interact with hikers and campers, and check permits.

Use your ranger vehicle to explore the first accessible area of the park, discover scenic locations, and experience your first wildlife encounters as you learn what it means to be a park ranger in Faremont National Park.

This demo offers a focused onboarding experience, providing a first impression of the role and atmosphere of Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator.
4311110.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
